Got it, adding sidebar with home, about and contact links.

In the conversation, the user initially requested the addition of a sidebar with navigation links for home, about, and contact. Following this, the AI presented a checklist of optional features including the addition of a "Hey There" button and various others focusing on Ethereum block updates, push notifications for blockchain events, a real-time Ethereum price tracker, app theme customization, and a detailed analytics dashboard. However, only the "Hey There" button feature was confirmed as selected. When the user reiterated the request for adding a "Hey There" button, the AI offered a new list of potential features that pivot more towards UI enhancements such as a Dark/Light mode toggle on the navbar, a dropdown menu under 'About', search functionality, real-time notifications for Ethereum blocks, user authentication, and a language selection dropdown, with the toggle for Dark/Light mode, search functionality, and user authentication marked as selected. Further, the AI acknowledged the addition of a navbar with the specified nav links. Lastly, when the user mentioned adding a navbar again, the AI sought more details about the project.
